Title: Recalibrates the final average salary retirement calculations in the New York state teachers' retirement system for Joanne Halverson
Summary: Recalibrates the final average salary retirement calculations in the New York state teachers' retirement system for Joanne Halverson by including certain earnings from the 2020-2021 year.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to recalibrating the final average salary retirement calculations in the New York state teachers' retirement system for Joanne Halverson
